Text: Re Holidays in Brazilplease see the attachment document Sara CT To Elizabeth SerralheiroENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Holidays in Brazil Can you please advise of legal holidays in Brazil during the remainder of February and March I dont know how many days Mardi Graslent last I need to plan future trips to Sao Paulo Thanks Sara

ESA Legal Management Meeting IS CONFIRMED FOR TOMORROWabove meeting has been rescheduled for tomorrow Wed June th at pm Brazil time pm Houston time The dialin numbers remain the same Please send me your updated report till tomorrow not later than noon Brazil time and also let me know in case you are not able to attend at this time Thanks and regards Elizabeth
ESA Legal Management Meetings reportsend me your updated report today not later than pm Brazil time Thanks regards Patricia

REMINDER ESA Legal Management Meeting Cc meeting has been rescheduled for Thursday June at the same time am Brazil time am Houston time The dialin numbers remain the same Toll Free International AccessCaller Paid Host Randy Young Confirmation Press at anytime during your conference call for operator assistance For those in So Paulo the conference room C is reserved Thanks regards Patricia

Re S Cone Trading IssuesRequestplease let me know if you have any questions Regards Elizabeth Elizabeth Serralheiro To John NovakENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Robert H GeorgeENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT George FrumkinENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sami ArapENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Rick HopkinsonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Robert C WilliamsENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Andrea GavinoENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Gisele S BrazENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Ana Cristina SantosENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Mary Ann OliveiraENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Cecilia MorellatoENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Jan CooleyENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject ESA LEGAL MANAGEMENT COMMITTEE MEETING formerly Chief Counsel Meeting As per Randy Youngs message below please plan to attend to this weekly meeting that will be held every Tuesdays at am Brazil time am Houston time The callin numbers are as follow Domestic dialin US callers International dialin Confirmation Host Randy Young Please send me an updated report every Monday until pm and you can still use the same table that you have being using for the formerly Chief Cousenl Meeting Thanks and regards Elizabeth Serralheiro Forwarded by Elizabeth SerralheiroENRONDEVELOPMENT on Randy Young To Sara CT cc Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Elizabeth SerralheiroENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re S Cone Trading IssuesRequest Many thanks Sara I appreciate your including Andrea in these calls and I am sure she will try to attend as many with you as schedule allows In the meantime the download once a week will certainly be helpful to me Sounds like a great vacation I am jealous Beth could you send Sara the callin number and times for my weekly legal management committee meeting Regards Randy Sara CT PM To Randy YoungENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re S Cone Trading IssuesRequest Randy I can certainly participate in your Tuesday morning meetings and I can appreciate the time constraints under which Andrea is working I believe that Lynn will defer to Ricks participation Please let me know if there is a call in number I think that I will be able to keep you updated through your meetings My need for meeting with Lynn and Brent stems from the fact that we are offshore Brazil and need to communicate regularly to keep the fires burning Have a great weekend I just got back from my vacation I went to LA and the weather was extraordinary So was the food Im looking forward to Sao Paulo Will see you soon Sara Randy NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Sara NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Robert H GeorgeENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject Re S Cone Trading IssuesRequest Sara Given the deal pressure we expect in the last quarter of especially in origination I am trying to eliminate as many duplicative meetings as possible Instead of having Andrea Bertone attend this weekly meeting could you and Lynn Aven attend my legal staff meeting along with Brent Hendry and Rick Hopkinson who are already scheduled to attend each week They are held on Tuesdays at am SP time That way we can get a direct report from you with a synthesized summary of the issues If you need to consult with Andrea Robert or me on an offline basis you can let us know in the meeting and we will arrange a separate call I believe this would be more efficient Thanks and please let me know Regards Randy Forwarded by Randy YoungENRONDEVELOPMENT on AM Andrea Bertone AM To Randy YoungENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re S Cone Trading Issues OK Ill do it Randy Young PM To Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject S Cone Trading Issues Can you try to make this Hopefully it will not take up much time I would want to get a summary download of issues from you in our weekly meetings Thanks ry Forwarded by Randy YoungENRONDEVELOPMENT on PM Sara CT PM To Lynn AvenENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Rick HopkinsonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Mark E CT Randy YoungENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Subject S Cone Trading Issues In an effort to establish regular communication on the progress of trading issues primarily related legal and tax perspectives in the S Cone Lynn and I have agreed to conference on Friday October at am Houston time and weekly at that time Would anyone else like to participate this Friday If you are interested in participating on a weekly basis are Fridays at am Houston time convenient for you My immediate concerns are financial trading issues However we can focus on all relevant issues as we so determine I will create a short list to initiate discussion Thanks Sara

Re ESA Legal Management Committee Meeting Reportssorry Sara I forgot that your participation is new on this meeting We are using the same format as we used on the formerly Chief Counsel Meetings Please let me know if you have any questions Best regards Elizabeth Sara CT To Elizabeth SerralheiroENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT cc Subject Re ESA Legal Management Committee Meeting Reports Does Randy prefer a particular format Sara Elizabeth NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To John NovakENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Robert H GeorgeENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT George FrumkinENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sami ArapENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Rick HopkinsonENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Brent HendryENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Andrea BertoneENRON NRONDEVELOPMENT Sara CT cc Subject ESA Legal Management Committee Meeting Reports Please send me your updated report today not later than pm Thanks Elizabeth
